ecommerce.title: E-commerce Product Filters
ecommerce.description: Let customers bookmark and share specific product searches with applied filters.

implementation.react:
import { create } from '@farajabien/slug-store'

const useProductFilters = create((set) => ({
  category: 'all',
  brands: [],
  priceRange: [0, 5000],
  inStock: false,
  sortBy: 'relevance',
  setCategory: (category) => set({ category }),
  toggleBrand: (brand) => set(state => ({
    brands: state.brands.includes(brand)
      ? state.brands.filter(b => b !== brand)
      : [...state.brands, brand]
  }))
}), { compress: true, key: 'filters' })
